description: metal candy vending machine with glass back and top front; background color is red with pictures of hands making shadow puppets on front and sides; base is gold colored; coin slot is in the form of a chimney on the peaked top; key is attached to the front with metal rings

title: "Stollwerck, Hand Shadows" (vending) mechanical bank
